introduction: SYNOPSISJang-won wants Tae-shik, a colleague, to change his personality. Jang-won warns Tae-shik of his mistrust in women before inviting to him to his house. Mun-hi, Jang-won's wife, is greatly surprised when she sees Tae-shik for he is an ex-boyfriend. Jang-won's boss, Wu-seok, only focuses on work and neglects Hyun-suk, his wife. She is always lonely and full of dissatisfaction. Wu-seok sometimes calls Jang-won for advice. He learns from Jang-won that Tae-shik refuses to marry in hopes of winning back his first love. Jang-won goes to Wu-seok's apartment on business and succumbs to the Hyun-suk's seductions. Tae-shik meets with Jang-won and warns him about his wife. Mun-hi sits in anguish. Jang-won sits with bloodshot eyes, filled with jealousy. When will the wall of jealousy come down for them?故事顾问邀请她到家里，劝告她去解决同时代女性的性格问题。张原的妻子莽熙，看到她的时候感到惊讶。这是一个古老的情人。昌原的老板Woosuk忽视了他的妻子Hyunsuk，同时忠于业务。玄淑总是孤独，不满。Wooseok有时叫出男人。泰植讲述独居的原因。为了失去他的初恋，一位因工作而来到伍斯克宅邸的男人，因为玄淑的诱惑而建立起了一种关系，被人揪心了。陨石碰到一个男人，并向他的妻子提出建议。变得焦虑的人变成嫉妒的化身，怀疑他的妻子，月亮冲出了令人沮丧的境地。在客厅里流着眼睛的男人Wan Mun熙，嫉妒之墙何时会被打破？
